channel.title: Gunz: The Duel and Gunster
channel.description:
I found a couple of good games either run or hosted by Ijji.
Sites: Ijji: Ijji.com (You get Gunz and Gunster from there)
In Gunz you start out with a sword (or dagger) and a gun. You can play deathmatches by yourself or on a team. Its 3d has good graphics. Almost no lag even on the eastern servers (For people in Europe and Asia).
Gunster is just a more complex version of Gunbound.
Thats my say!

item.title: Gunz: The Duel and Gunster
item.dc:creator: @Steelsword Steelsword
item.description:
@Steelsword wrote:

[quote=“teh dew, post:2, topic:38914”]In gunz, there is too many hacker’s now. Yes at a time gunz was fun, now with all the hackers its not.[/quote] Yes hackers have messed up Gunz and Counter Strike Source … EXTREMLY BAD.
